title: ABSOLUTELY STUNNING 3 BED, 3 BATH IN QUEEN VILLAGE!
description:
Absolutely stunning 3 bed, 3 bath in Queen Village! This well-maintained, new construction (2016) townhome comes with a large rooftop deck with 360 views of the city, finished basement with washer/dryer, designated parking spot, beautiful wide plank hardwood floors, and lots of natural light. This community is highly sought after for its Meredith School District and rare off-street new construction in this neighborhood. Pets are not preferred but can be approved depending on circumstances. No smoking. The tenant is responsible for all utilities. title: Located in North Liberties, This 2-bedroom, 2.5 Bathroom Condo!!
description:
Located in North Liberties, this two bedroom, two and a half bathroom condo is bright, open, and move-in ready. Enter into a sun-soaked and open-concept great room with high ceilings and hardwood floors. Separate living and dining areas share access to a quaint private balcony, perfect for enjoying a morning cup of coffee. The modern kitchen boasts crisp white cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, upgraded countertops, and a breakfast bar. There is a powder room nearby. Both of the spacious bedrooms enjoy large windows, excellent closet space, and brand new carpet flooring. The primary suite has an ensuite bath with a single vanity and tub shower, while the second bedroom enjoys a full hall bath. Both bathrooms feature designer tilework selections. Additional home highlights include excellent storage space, a washer and dryer, and central air conditioning. Part of a gated building with a courtyard, residents enjoy living steps away from coveted cafes, renowned restaurants, and local shops. The building is just minutes from I-95 and easily accessible to Center City via uber or public transportation. Available for as soon as immediate move in. Pets considered on a case by case basis at landlord's sole discretion, subject to any building restrictions. Tenants responsible for utilities based on usage.
712-16 N 2nd St #31

title: Welcome to this amazing condo on a pristine Art Museum
description:
Welcome to this amazing condo on a pristine Art Museum/Spring Garden block. This great home is located in the Greencort Condominium, an oasis on beautiful and historic Green St. It has an expansive and elegant common courtyard, rooftop deck with great Center City views and a deeded PARKING spot. Great location, a few blocks from public transportation including the Broad Street line, walking distance to Center City, museums, restaurants and shops. Make your appointment today!!!

description:

The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as December 9, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, cafes, and more! Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, Gorjana, Paper Source, and Philadelphia Runner. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, and Parc. Savor a cup of coffee at Vibrant, Ultimo, Alchemy, Elixr, Bottega Rittenhouse, and J'aime French Café. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Relax with a manicure at Philly Nails Bar. Shop for fresh flowers and seasonal produce at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday. There is so much to do in this area!
